----- Original Message -----
From: "Arvind Sharma" <mailtoarvind@...>


>
> Hi,
>       I am new to junit framework. I want to know what
> will be the best way to write test classes for Action
> Listeners of a Swing GUI. I mean how do we to test the
> objects of Action Listener Classes.

By this, if you mean that you have objects which are adding themselves as
listeners to some Swing GUI class, and your intent is to test what happens
when they are called when some action they are listening to happens - I
suggest you use Mock Objects or stubs.

Lauren
